extension.summary: Stream music from computer games and demos
extension.description: Search, stream and download computer game and demoscene music from a variety of platforms. There are more than 200,000 tunes to listen to, all rendered and streamed in realtime. The collection is managed by Coma [coma@modland.com]. See http://www.modland.com for more information.
